item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Sounds Of The 80s (Album x3) (Qobuz 44.1kHz FLAC)
item.description:
Hi.

I can't seem to find these anywhere else. Can someone please rip them into FLAC for me?

1) https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/s...nt-me-1980-1983-various-artists/cughm6enu5xoc
2) https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/s...-baby-1984-1986-various-artists/a6yyyoy0e6qdb
3) https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/s...e-now-1987-1989-various-artists/a010rde9q3vwc

Please

Thanks a lot in advance.
item.author: OrangeGround35
